{{Infobox battle item |name = Held Items |image = [[File:Held_Items_Modal.png|thumb]] |caption = Held Items Menu |location = Johto }} ==Description== '''Held Items''' are items that can be equipped by Pokémon to boost certain statistics of that Pokémon such as Attack, Experience Gain, and [[Pokérus|EV Yield]]. Some Held Items can also be used to trigger evolutions. Held Items can be equipped in the Item Bag tab of the Items menu option. ==Details== As many as 6 Held Items can be equipped simultaneously - each Pokémon can only be equipped with 1 item at a time, and each item type can only be held by one Pokémon at a time. Held Items do not break. However, Held Items are consumed when they are removed - an individual Held Item cannot be reused. Some Held Items can only be held by Pokémon that have met certain requirements. For example: Machop can hold a [[Black Belt]] (Fighting Type-specific item) while Gyarados cannot. A Machop that is either ''Contagious'' or ''Resistant'' with Pokérus can hold a Macho Brace, while a Machop that is ''Uninfected'' or ''Infected'' cannot. ==Acquisition== Held Items can be found in [[Shops]], as Loot in [[Dungeons]] or as [[Rare Hold Items|rare drops]] from different Pokémon. ==List of items== {|class="wikitable sortable" !
